001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.canvas;
002
003import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
004import com.opencsv.CSVReader;
005import com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.Reader;
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.SortedMap;
012import java.util.TreeMap;
013import java.util.regex.Matcher;
014import java.util.regex.Pattern;
015
016public class CanvasGradesCSVParser implements CanvasGradesCSVColumnNames {
017  private static final Pattern assignmentNamePattern = Pattern.compile("(.+) \\((\\d+)\\)");
018  private static final String[] ignoredColumnNames = new String[] {
019    "ID",
020    "SIS User ID",
021    SECTION_COLUMN,
022    "Getting Ready Current Points",
023    "Getting Ready Final Points",
024    "Getting Ready Current Score",
025    "Getting Ready Unposted Current Score",
026    "Getting Ready Final Score",
027    "Getting Ready Unposted Final Score",
028    "Assignments Current Points",
029    "Assignments Final Points",
030    "Assignments Current Score",
031    "Assignments Unposted Current Score",
032    "Assignments Final Score",
033    "Assignments Unposted Final Score",
034    "Imported Assignments Current Points",
035    "Imported Assignments Final Points",
036    "Imported Assignments Current Score",
037    "Imported Assignments Unposted Current Score",
038    "Imported Assignments Final Score",
039    "Imported Assignments Unposted Final Score",
040    "Current Points",
041    "Final Points",
042    "Current Score",
043    "Unposted Current Score",
044    "Final Score",
045    "Unposted Final Score"
046  };
047
048  private int studentNameColumn;
049  private int studentIdColumn;
050  private int canvasIdColumn;
051  private int sectionIdColumn;
052  private final SortedMap<Integer, GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment> columnToAssignment = new TreeMap<>();
053  private final GradesFromCanvas grades;
054
055  public CanvasGradesCSVParser(Reader reader) throws IOException {
056    CSVReader csv = new CSVReader(reader);
057    try {
058      extractColumnNamesFromFirstLineOfCsv(csv.readNext());
059      extractPossiblePointsFromSecondLineOfCsv(csv.readNext());
060
061      grades = new GradesFromCanvas();
062
063      String[] studentLine;
064      while ((studentLine = csv.readNext()) != null) {
065        addStudentAndGradesFromLineOfCsv(studentLine);
066      }
067
068    } catch (CsvValidationException ex) {
069      throw new IOException("While parsing CSV", ex);
070    }
071
072  }
073
074  private void addStudentAndGradesFromLineOfCsv(String[] studentLine) {
075    GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudent student = createStudentFrom(studentLine);
076
077    if (!student.getFirstName().equals("Test")) {
078      this.grades.addStudent(student);
079    }
080
081    addGradesFromLineOfCsv(student, studentLine);
082  }
083
084  private void addGradesFromLineOfCsv(GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudent student, String[] studentLine) {
085    this.columnToAssignment.forEach((column, assignment) -> {
086      String score = studentLine[column];
087      if (!isEmptyString(score)) {
088        student.setScore(assignment, parseScore(score));
089      }
090    });
091
092  }
093
094  private boolean isEmptyString(String score) {
095    return "".equals(score);
096  }
097
098  private double parseScore(String score) {
099    return Double.parseDouble(score);
100  }
101
102  private GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudent createStudentFrom(String[] studentLine) {
103    String studentName = studentLine[studentNameColumn];
104    Pattern studentNamePattern = Pattern.compile("(.*), (.*)");
105    Matcher matcher = studentNamePattern.matcher(studentName);
106    if (matcher.matches()) {
107      GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudentBuilder builder = GradesFromCanvas.newStudent();
108      builder.setFirstName(matcher.group(2));
109      builder.setLastName(matcher.group(1));
110      builder.setLoginId(studentLine[studentIdColumn]);
111      builder.setCanvasId(studentLine[canvasIdColumn]);
112      builder.setSection(studentLine[sectionIdColumn]);
113
114      return builder.create();
115
116    } else {
117      throw new IllegalStateException("Can't parse student name \"" + studentName + "\"");
118    }
119  }
120
121  private void extractPossiblePointsFromSecondLineOfCsv(String[] secondLine) {
122    this.columnToAssignment.forEach((column, assignment) -> {
123      String possiblePointsText = secondLine[column];
124      try {
125        assignment.setPossiblePoints(Double.parseDouble(possiblePointsText));
126
127      } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
128        throw new IllegalStateException("Can't parse points \"" + possiblePointsText + "\" for " + assignment.getName());
129      }
130    });
131
132  }
133
134  private void extractColumnNamesFromFirstLineOfCsv(String[] firstLine) {
135    for (int i = 0; i < firstLine.length; i++) {
136      String cell = firstLine[i];
137      switch (cell) {
138        case STUDENT_COLUMN:
139          this.studentNameColumn = i;
140          break;
141        case "SIS Login ID":
142          this.studentIdColumn = i;
143          break;
144        case ID_COLUMN:
145          this.canvasIdColumn = i;
146          break;
147        case SECTION_COLUMN:
148          this.sectionIdColumn = i;
149          break;
150        default:
151          if (!isColumnIgnored(cell)) {
152            addAssignment(cell, i);
153          }
154      }
155    }
156
157  }
158
159  @VisibleForTesting
160  static GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment createAssignment(String assignmentText) {
161    Matcher matcher = assignmentNamePattern.matcher(assignmentText);
162    if (matcher.matches()) {
163      String name = matcher.group(1);
164      String idText = matcher.group(2);
165      return new GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment(name, Integer.parseInt(idText));
166
167    } else {
168      throw new IllegalStateException("Can't create Assignment from \"" + assignmentText + "\"");
169    }
170  }
171
172  private void addAssignment(String assignmentText, int column) {
173    this.columnToAssignment.put(column, createAssignment(assignmentText));
174
175  }
176
177  private boolean isColumnIgnored(String columnName) {
178    for (String ignored : ignoredColumnNames) {
179      if (ignored.equals(columnName)) {
180        return true;
181      }
182    }
183    return false;
184  }
185
186  public List<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment> getAssignments() {
187    return new ArrayList<>(this.columnToAssignment.values());
188  }
189
190  public GradesFromCanvas getGrades() {
191    return this.grades;
192  }
193
194}
